main.name: Nirupama Sharma
main.description: I am working as a Software Engineer at Intel Corporation.
main.bio: I am a Software Engineer with 5 years and 8 months of work experience with companies like Intel Corporation, TIAA, New York Life Insurance etc. I work on large scale distributed systems. I am a Master of Science in Computer Science graduate from Northeastern University, Boston. I work as Software Engineer at Intel Corporation.
